-| wceq(c7, cmpt(s0, c5, crio(s1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c4))))
-| wi(w0, wnel(c6, c5))
-| wceq(c5, co(c3, cnbgr, c0))
-| wb(wnel(c0, co(c3, cnbgr, c6)), wn(wcel(c0, co(c3, cnbgr, c6))))
-| wceq(c1, co(c3, cnbgr, c6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∉ c1)
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(Edg ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c6)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ FriendGraph)
⊣ c7 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, { s0, s1 } ∈ c4))
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∉ c5)
⊣ c5 =(c3[NeighbVtx]c0)
⊣ (c0 ∉(c3[NeighbVtx]c6)↔ ¬ c0 ∈(c3[NeighbVtx]c6))
⊣ c1 =(c3[NeighbVtx]c6)

body.origin: |- wb(wnel(c0, co(c3, cnbgr, c6)), wn(wcel(c0, co(c3, cnbgr, c6))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wnel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cedg, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, c6))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfrgr))
-| wceq(c7, cmpt(s0, c5, crio(s1, c1, wcel(cpr(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c4))))
-| wi(w0, wnel(c6, c5))
-| wceq(c5, co(c3, cnbgr, c0))
-| wceq(c1, co(c3, cnbgr, c6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∉ c1)
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c3)
⊣ c4 =(Edg ` c3)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c6)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ FriendGraph)
⊣ c7 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦ iota(s1 ∈ c1, { s0, s1 } ∈ c4))
⊣ (w0 → c6 ∉ c5)
⊣ c5 =(c3[NeighbVtx]c0)
⊣ c1 =(c3[NeighbVtx]c6)
